'''''Lycoperdon nigrescens''''', commonly known as the '''dusky puffball''',<ref name="Phillips 2013"/> is a type of [[puffball]] mushroom in the genus ''[[Lycoperdon]]''. It was first [[species description|described]] scientifically in 1794 by the Swedish naturalist [[Göran Wahlenberg]].<ref name="urlMycoBank: Lycoperdon nigrescens"/>
